version_description: Everyone can enjoy the visual enhancements in this version.  Those with an iPhone 6 or iPhone 6 Plus are in for a special treat with the beautiful view of the night sky that Starlight has to offer.

With the New Year comes new improvements to Starlight!
This update includes performance improvements, as well as minor bug fixes.
The phases of the Moon are now properly displayed.
This update provides more optimizations for performance.
This version of Starlight is updated for iOS 10 and includes some improvements to the display of objects in our solar system.
Fix for cardinal directions.
Updated for iOS 11.

This is a major update to Starlight, with improved visuals, streamlined performance, and more information on celestial objects.  Learn more about Stars, Planets, and Constellations.  Enjoy the night sky as never before.
New Augmented Reality mode.  Use your iPhone or iPad's camera to see stars, constellations, and planets against a realistic backdrop.

Starlight is always improving and evolving to better your sky viewing experience!

If you want the technical details of what's new in this release: There are some improvements to the rendering pipeline that should speed things up on slower devices.
New Augmented reality mode!  Touch the camera icon to visualize the star field against your own surroundings.  Works indoors or outdoors.
Support for all interface orientations.
Support across all interface orientations.
New Augmented Reality Stargazing!

Checks to ensure Location Services are enabled in order to prevent ominous black screen. Future versions will have custom location selection.
App now asks to use camera only when Augmented Reality features are accessed.
Support for older versions of iOS.
New Augmented Reality mode!  The perfect app for a romantic Valentine's Day.

Starlight is expanding!
Now with 110,000 new stars.
Unique day and night settings.
Enhanced zoom.

Starlight is expanding!
Language support for Spanish, French, Italian, German, and Portuguese!
Now with 110,000 new stars.
Unique day and night settings.
Enhanced zoom.

Point your iPhone like a magic lens into the Night Sky

Bug fix for users with compass calibration turned on.
Improved accuracy!
Improved AR camera performance.
Interface enhancement and optimizations for performance.
Night Vision Mode!
Night Vision Mode!
Enhanced Zoom!
